title: BRIEF-Keyware Technologies buys 2.09% stake in Congra Software
text:
BRIEF-Keyware Technologies buys 2.09% stake in Congra Software 
Oct 12 Keyware Technologies NV : 
* Acquires 2.09 percent stake in Congra Software S.a.r.l 
* Transacation value is 250,000 euros ($284,425) 
Source text: bit.ly/1ZvAGAD Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8790 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
